content: this is sweet little no-sew mouse loves her little no-sew house you ll need 8 0mm crochet hook bernat blanket yarn in beige birch red terracotta rose & gray seagull gray 15mm safety eyes fiber fill stuffing darning needle stitch markers 2 different colors - blue and yellow are used in instructions scissors abbreviations single_crochet - single_crochet mc - magic_ring increase - increase bob - bobble stitch 6-loop st - stitch decrease - decrease chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch fo - fasten_off flo - front loops only notes the house is worked in a combination of rounds row and freehand creating single crochets along the edge of row the mouse is worked in rounds the bobble stitch in the mouse is a 6-loop bobble use stitch markers where indicated on the top of the house you will be working counter clockwise therefore the technical wrong side of the top will be facing out/up mouse mushroom amigurumi plushie plush plushies stuffed animals
